name: Chamomile
properties: Mild, floral aroma; known for calming effects and reducing anxiety.

name: Lavender
properties: Soothing and fragrant; commonly used for stress relief and better sleep.

name: Ginseng
properties: Energizing and invigorating; supports cognitive function and reduces fatigue.

name: Green Tea
properties: Rich in antioxidants; enhances alertness and metabolism.

name: Dandelion
properties: Detoxifying herb; supports liver health and digestion.

name: Peppermint
properties: Cooling and refreshing; aids digestion and relieves bloating.

name: Valerian Root
properties: Natural sedative; helps improve sleep quality and reduce anxiety.

name: Passionflower
properties: Calming herb; traditionally used to relieve stress and promote relaxation.

name: Ginkgo Biloba
properties: Brain-boosting herb; enhances memory and cognitive function.

name: Rosemary
properties: Aromatic herb; traditionally associated with improved concentration and cognitive function.
